Text:
Nuts. 500mg of Omega-3. The package has all the appeal of an average healthy snack bar. It also touts Non GMO ingredients, and they donate 5% of their profits to PeaceWorks Foundation. Bonus. So, I picked up a few on close-out at my local grocer.

Made in Australia, stored on a shelf, put on close-out, and traveled around in my bag for awhile... not even close to expiration, but still... it has been around. I expected a mediocre nut bar. Not so. It's so good I felt compelled to look online for more.

Looking over the ingredients list, nothing stands out as "The Flavor" that makes these so tasty, so I'll just leave it at that. Simple, sweet and soft, crunchy and flavorful. I wish I would have bought the rest of the ones I saw on close-out. These are good.
